reuters.title: CRONUS INDUSTRIES INC <CRNS> SELLS UNIT
reuters.body: Cronus Industries Inc said it agreed to sell its heat transfer equipment business, Southwestern Engineering Co, for a slight premium over book value, plus a release of Cronus from liability on approximately three mln dlrs of subsidiary indebtedness. The company said the sale to a subsidiary of Senior Engineering Group PLC, a British company, will take place this month. Reuter 
